class="content" role="main" itemprop="mainContentOfPage" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Blog"><div class="breadcrumb" itemprop="breadcrumb">	You are reading story at:,<span xmlns:v="http://rdf.data-vocabulary.org/#"><span typeof="v:Breadcrumb"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com" rel="v:url" property="v:title">yourstoryclub</a> &raquo; <span rel="v:child" typeof="v:Breadcrumb"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com/most-popular-short-stories/" rel="v:url" property="v:title">Most Popular Short Stories</a> &raquo; <span rel="v:child" typeof="v:Breadcrumb"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com/story-category/short-stories-love/" rel="v:url" property="v:title">Love Short Stories</a> &raquo; <span class="breadcrumb_last">Time with self.</span></span></span></span></span></div><article class="post-172426 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-short-stories-love tag-boyfriend tag-girlfriend tag-life tag-love tag-memories tag-smile entry" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting" itemprop="blogPost"><header class="entry-header"><h1 class="entry-title" itemprop="headline">Time with self.</h1> ,<span class="alignleft"><img alt='' src='http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/b8842b189ffbaba92b0141f10ea7ae11?s=85&#038;d=mm&#038;r=g' srcset='http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/b8842b189ffbaba92b0141f10ea7ae11?s=170&amp;d=mm&amp;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-85 photo' height='85' width='85' /></span><p class="entry-meta">English Short Story published on <time class="entry-time" itemprop="datePublished" datetime="2017-01-20T14:38:17+00:00">January 20, 2017</time> by <span class="entry-author" itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com/author/winterwriter/" class="entry-author-link" itemprop="url" rel="author"><span class="entry-author-name" itemprop="name">WinterWriter</span></a></span> <div class="textwidget"><p><strong>Excerpt: </strong> She saw the light. There straight in front of her was the oval mirror. The room was lit yellow and she looked at her golden face being reflected into the mirror. <strong>(Reads: 38)</strong> </p></div><section id="text-before-content-ad" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle"></div><div class="textwidget" style="margin-bottom:10px;"><!--AD START--><div style="text-align: center;">,<!-- YSC_RESP_1 -->,<ins class="adsbygoogle",     style="display:block",     data-ad-client="ca-pub-9888966704027314",     data-ad-slot="4736285789",     data-ad-format="auto"></ins>,<script>,(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});,</script>          ,            </div><!--AD END--></div></div></section><section id="text-before-content" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle">&nbsp;</div><div class="textwidget"></div></div><section></p></header><div class="entry-content" itemprop="text"><p>The depression was not ready to leave her. And the reason you ask? Well the many red pimples on her face were also being stubborn. And some of it caught on me too. No! Not the pimples but the gloomy mood. I tried to convince her, make up her mood through many ways, took her on romantic dates, bought her a huge teddy (she loves such stuffs), chocolates (which she declined to have saying they would make her condition worse) and many such things. Even hugs and kisses where not working. I was feeling terrible, clueless about how to bring back my cheery beloved. I thought, wondered deep and then suddenly I realized.</p>,<p>And so one fine day I took her to my room. I had blindfolded her. There after making the arrangements I whispered into her ears, &#8216; when I exit the room you are allowed to remove the blindfolds, okay?&#8217; I gave a peck on her forehead and left. She saw the light. There straight in front of her was the oval mirror. The room was lit yellow and she looked at her golden face being reflected into the mirror.</p>,<p>Many days have passed since then and believe me her smile and energy is more contagious then ever! That day back then I had realized that it was not me whom she needed, she needed herself, she had to rediscover herself. For her the mirror had turned into a window, a look into her inner self, which made her bravely question the self-deprecation, which made her realize that acceptance was the key to peace, she agreed to accept what she was or how she looked. The mirror made her believe in self and filled her up with a newfound confidence. In the end it was not about being lonely in there, it was about a time spent with self.</p>,<p>&#8211;END&#8211;</p>,<div class="sharedaddy sd-sharing-enabled"><div class="robots-nocontent sd-block itemtype="http://schema.org/Person"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com/author/vinus/" class="entry-author-link" itemprop="url" rel="author"><span class="entry-author-name" itemprop="name">vinus</span></a></span> <div class="textwidget"><p><strong>Excerpt: </strong>She wanted to kill him and at the same time, wanted to hold him. She was fully packed bomb of excitement, anger, revenge and so many shades of emotions in between.  <strong>(Reads: 64)</strong> </p></div><section id="text-before-content-ad" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle"></div><div class="textwidget" style="margin-bottom:10px;"><!--AD START--><div style="text-align: center;">,<!-- YSC_RESP_LINK1 -->,<ins class="adsbygoogle",     style="display:block",     data-ad-client="ca-pub-9888966704027314",     data-ad-slot="3830056582",     data-ad-format="link"></ins>,<script>,(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});,</script>          ,            </div><!--AD END--></div></div></section><section id="text-before-content" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle">&nbsp;</div><div class="textwidget"></div></div><section></p></header><div class="entry-content" itemprop="text"><p>“Oh My God&#8230;is it Zaggard?” Grishma cried with delight.</p>,<p>“Yupp Sugar”</p>,<p>“But how could you possibly get this pill? It’s banned for youngsters.”</p>,<p>“Um&#8230;I have my contacts in Pharma company. So,I managed to get one pill for you. It’s your Valentine’s gift dear.”</p>,<p>“So nice of you Shikhar. This is the best gift I’ve ever get.” She planted a gentle kiss on his lips, whispering, “ I Love You.” Shikhar grabbed her from the back &amp; pulled her closer. His other hand unplugged the bunch of her velvet hair.</p>,<p>“One sec&#8221; Grishma freed herself from his grip and rushed into the kitchen. There, with the help of water, she pushed the pill inside her mouth, to the digestive system.</p>,<p>When she came out, Shikhar undressed himself immediately. She ran like a storm and the game of passionate love began.</p>,<hr />,<p>The moments of extreme happiness are very rare in our life. To prolong these moments, scientists working on human emotions, along with modern Pharma discovered a special pill. You need to consume a pill with water. And in next one hour, if the emotional level crosses high level threshold, you froze &amp; can enjoy that moment for complete ONE HOUR!!</p>,<hr />,<p>In her bedroom, they were having se* like this was the last day on earth. Today, she was going to hold the mirage of orgasm for one long hour!!</p>,<p>Grishma was little away from her extreme point when Shikhar stepped up his speed and in few seconds, explode inside her. It was little unexpected for her as it was his treat. Anyway, she grabbed him more tightly, wrapping her legs around him, suggesting to continue the pace somehow. But much to her surprise, Shikhar pushed her away and got up from the bed. Without uttering a single word, he dressed himself up. Maggie got shocked.</p>,<p>“What the hell happened&#8221; she asked him holding his wrist.</p>,<p>“I&#8217;m leaving&#8221;</p>,<p>“Why? Are you nuts or what. Don’t you see I am not fulfilled?”</p>,<p>“Do you think I&#8217;m an idiot? You cheated me twice,got my a<em>s arrested once. And now, you want me to fulfill you! Bullsh</em>t.”</p>,<p>“How dare you?”</p>,<p>“Don’t shout. You deserve this, bi^^h.” He slipped the shoes on his feet and started to walk away.</p>,<p>Grishma ran behind him, naked. She wanted to kill him and at the same time, wanted to hold him. She was fully packed bomb of excitement, anger, revenge and so many shades of emotions in between. Her condition was worse than a fish out of water.</p>,<p>Shikhar neglected her &amp; reached to the door. She picked up a flower-pot on dressing table, lift her hand, stretch it in full strength and…</p>,<p>IT TRIGGERED. Her emotions froze. She had crossed the threshold of emotions. Shikhar half-turned and murmured,“ Happy Valentine’s day dear.”</p>,<p>He smiled and shut the door, leaving the statue of Maggie behind him.</p>,<p>&#8211;END&#8211;</p>,<div class="sharedaddy itemtype="http://schema.org/Person"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com/author/durga-prasad/" class="entry-author-link" itemprop="url" rel="author"><span class="entry-author-name" itemprop="name">Durga Prasad</span></a></span> <div class="textwidget"><p><strong>Excerpt: </strong>People are of the opinion nothing can predict what will happen in love and war, anything can happen,anybody can betray. Why it is so cannot be justified. <strong>(Reads: 45)</strong> </p></div><section id="text-before-content-ad" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle"></div><div class="textwidget" style="margin-bottom:10px;"><!--AD START--><div style="text-align: center;">,<!-- YSC_RESP_1 -->,<ins class="adsbygoogle",     style="display:block",     data-ad-client="ca-pub-9888966704027314",     data-ad-slot="4736285789",     data-ad-format="auto"></ins>,<script>,(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});,</script>          ,            </div><!--AD END--></div></div></section><section id="text-before-content" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle">&nbsp;</div><div class="textwidget"></div></div><section></p></header><div class="entry-content" itemprop="text"><ol>,<li>Not once but many a time she asked me how much more I loved her, every time I kept silent as the shore of the ocean the moment the wave touches it now and then, as the storm uproots the innocent trees all of a sudden within a twinkle of eyes and moreover as the ray of the Sun snatches the life of so called dewdrops within a few seconds, only he knows, I know and God knows what happened on that very day when we were together at the top of the hill body to body and soul to soul talking about only love, nothing else but love.</p>,</li>,<li>,<p>Never, never I believed you would come so closer that I felt your breath and its warmth that was coming out one after another. You caught my fingers and drew them towards your heart and said,” Just realise how it echoes and for whom? It bits for you, only for you and will continue to bit till you love me most.” In reply I said, “Never, never do I believe in stating as to how much more I love you as anything else I see all around. You are none but my all in all , my head and heart, my body and soul, and whenever you have any doubt in what I utter , you may test me anywhere , anytime I am always ready for that.</p>,</li>,<li>,<p>It was day when we came to the top of the hill , the Sun was above our head , the sky was clear enough to see even beyond it, only a few kites and vultures were roaming about up down in the open sky with their babies along. Truly speaking I thought I were a bird and could fly freely alike up above the sky and prayed to God to create me a bird and to send me to the earth once again after I leave for heavenly abode. It came out of the core of my soul and perhaps He smiled on my sheer innocence.</p>,</li>,<li>,<p>My dear friends! If you believe in or not I care not, but truth is truth, no substitute of truth, in case there be any, it is nothing but truth.</p>,</li>,<li>,<p>It was top hill of the “Hundru Fall” whereup we were sitting together indulging in love affair and romance more than Romeo and Jolliet and Shire Fraud.</p>,</li>,<li>,<p>The beauty of the falls we were staring at from the top of the hill and listening to the musical sound that coming out of such a bigger height to the downwards in force taking turn as fast as it could be to its destination, no mercy with anyone or anything else that happened to intervene or interrupt in its motion or force , if this be taking life even to the unknown world, once gone, never dreams of coming once again.</p>,</li>,<li>,<p>Our legs were hanging down together and touching together as if indicating for something as thirst or hunger for anything unusual, just then she dragged her legs I too and sat down face to face, she drew my chin nearer and nearer to hers, kissed my lips time and again and patted my curly hairs and the last but not the least peeped into the depth of my eyes and earnestly proposed.</p>,</li>,<li>,<p>“Can you jump into the fall if you love me most? Take it for guaranteed I will follow you too just after.”<br />,“My dear friends! If you believe in or not, no sooner I heard it than I jumped into the fall, I saw while drowning with the current of the waterfall, she stood up and left without looking behind as to what happened to me, where I was drowned to death or still alive.</p>,</li>,<li>And it is to my utter surprise even after many a decade she is never seen anywhere though I make a round from the sunrise to sunset in and around the fall and truly speaking for whom I still await to come &#8211; to come only to justify.</li>,<li>My dear friends! Although I died physically but spiritually I am still alive.</li>,<li>And Still I wait for her to come only to justify what wrong I have done to her.</li>,</ol>,<p>&#8211;END&#8211;<br />,Writer: Durga Prasad<br />,29th. December 2016, Thursday.</p>,<hr />,<div class="sharedaddy sd-sharing-enabled"><div class="robots-nocontent sd-block sd-social sd-social-icon-text sd-sharing"><h3 class="sd-title">Share this tag-kolkata tag-lawyer entry" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting" itemprop="blogPost"><header class="entry-header"><h1 class="entry-title" itemprop="headline">Love Comes Back</h1> ,<span class="alignleft"><img alt='' src='http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/555cccb785236673e9a391b8eebba7ac?s=85&#038;d=mm&#038;r=g' srcset='http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/555cccb785236673e9a391b8eebba7ac?s=170&amp;d=mm&amp;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-85 photo' height='85' width='85' /></span><p class="entry-meta">English Short Story published on <time class="entry-time" itemprop="datePublished" datetime="2017-01-19T13:25:33+00:00">January 19, 2017</time> by <span class="entry-author" itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com/author/sarbasuchi/" class="entry-author-link" itemprop="url" rel="author"><span class="entry-author-name" itemprop="name">sarbasuchi</span></a></span> <div class="textwidget"><p><strong>Excerpt: </strong>There was this instant liking that he has felt for Sunayna from the time he saw her. Shankha turned on the music with some old classics. Sunayna was chatting continuously, she seemed to be a chatterbox.  <strong>(Reads: 172)</strong> </p></div><section id="text-before-content-ad" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle"></div><div class="textwidget" style="margin-bottom:10px;"><!--AD START--><div style="text-align: center;">,<!-- YSC_RESP_1 -->,<ins class="adsbygoogle",     style="display:block",     data-ad-client="ca-pub-9888966704027314",     data-ad-slot="4736285789",     data-ad-format="auto"></ins>,<script>,(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});,</script>          ,            </div><!--AD END--></div></div></section><section id="text-before-content" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle">&nbsp;</div><div class="textwidget"></div></div><section></p></header><div class="entry-content" itemprop="text"><p>It was raining heavily all day. It was in the middle of June and monsoon had just got started in Maharashtra. Shankha Ray was driving back from Pune to Mumbai. Being a busy lawyer he had travelled to Pune to appear for his client in the civil court in a property dispute. Shankha  is all of 36 years of age, average height, fair complexioned. After passing out law from Government law college in West Bengal which is about a few hours drive from Kolkata, Shankha had made a name for himself in the field of law during the last 12 years.</p>,<p>Being in rainy season there was huge traffic in Mumbai Pune highway. Today is 15<sup>th</sup> June, Shankha thought. Memories came flashing through his mind. This fateful day Nisha had left him for good. 10 years, it has been a long time, Shankha thought.</p>,<p>He had come from a humble lower middle class background. He did not have the luxuries and the long list of girlfriends which his other friends boasted of. After an incident which ravaged his entire life he was broken.  He had emerged himself in work and almost became a recluse.</p>,<p>She was Nisha, a girl he loved dearly from the bottom of his heart. Both of them were soulmates and they promised to each other that they will spend the rest of their lives with each other.</p>,<p>“I cannot live without you. Promise me you will never leave me? “Nisha had asked Shankha.</p>,<p>She was his neighbor and childhood sweetheart. They stayed in FD block in salt Lake in Kolkata. Both were deeply and madly in love with each other.</p>,<p>“Even if ever I will be not with you physically remember I will always be with you and watch over you” Nisha had said the day before the fateful incident.</p>,<p>But fate had other things planned for him. Nisha was the single child. Nisha’s father was an engineer in government department.</p>,<p>Nisha had asked her father “Dad I want you to meet someone.”</p>,<p>“What does he do?”</p>,<p>“He is a lawyer, started his practice a couple of years back.”</p>,<p>“Okay, I want to meet this boy, bring him on this weekend to our house.”  Her father had said.</p>,<p>That fateful day both of them had gone for a date in Victoria Memorial in Kolkata. They were to go to Nisha’s house in the evening to meet her father. While coming back from Victoria Memorial with Nisha on his bike, Shankha had an accident. A sedan had rammed his bike from behind. Shankha had lost control. His bike skidded across the street and hit the divider in the middle of the road.</p>,<p>Shankha could not get up, the bones on his chest were fractured. He could barely turn his head to see Nisha lying in a pool of blood. She was already dead when they brought her to SSKM hospital.</p>,<p>The only thing that was left to Shankha was the ring that Nisha had gifted him on his birthday. He looked at the ring at his finger in right hand. 10 years had passed since, but the memory of that day seems as fresh as ever. Shankha had promised to himself never to fall in love again, that is until now……….</p>,<p>The traffic was stagnant, Shankha was sitting in his car for almost half an hour without moving an inch. Suddenly the sound of a horn from behind brought Shankha to the present. The car in front had started moving. He pressed on the clutch and started his car. He had reached Khandala. He glanced at his watch, it was 7 p.m. It will take another 2 hours to reach Mumbai. But the traffic being as it is it may take half an hour extra, Shankha thought.</p>,<p>Shankha was not aware of the twist his life awaits in the next turn. While passing Khandala he saw a beautiful girl standing, drenched in rain hoping for a lift. He saw her closely, she was of fair complexion, slim and she was tall about 5 feet 5inches. Shankha pressed the brakes, then opened the window of his car.</p>,<p>She asked him “Can you drop me to Mumbai?”</p>,<p>She said she had come to Khandala for picnic with her friends. But apparently they had a fight and they left for Mumbai without taking her. Since it was raining like hell she could not get a taxi.  Shankha asked her to hop in his car. She was wearing blue jeans and yellow kurta.</p>,<p>She introduced herself. Her name was Sunayna Sharma. She worked for a finance firm in Mumbai. Originally hailing from Kanpur she is working in Mumbai for the last 5 years. She had completed M.Com 5 years back from Delhi University.  After passing M.Com she had come to Mumbai after getting the job in the finance firm.</p>,<p>There was this instant liking that he has felt for Sunayna from the time he saw her.  Shankha turned on the music with some old classics.</p>,<p>Sunayna was chatting continuously, she seemed to be a chatterbox. Somehow Shankha started liking her.</p>,<p>“Where do you stay”? She asked.</p>,<p>“I stay in Andheri, where will I drop you?”</p>,<p>“I stay in Navi Mumbai, you can drop me in Vashi.”</p>,<p>“What do you do for a living”? she asked.</p>,<p>“I am a lawyer”. He replied. Soon they reached Navi Mumbai. Shankha dropped off Sunayna in Vashi then he proceeded for Andheri.</p>,<p>Shankha stayed alone with his dog Sweety. She was a white pomerian. Sunayna had created a stirring in his heart, Shankha was thinking of  Sunayna the whole night.</p>,<p>Suddenly he got a call in his cell in midnight, he picked up the call, and the caller was Sunayna.</p>,<p>“I forgot to say you thanks. If you had not given me the lift, I would not been able to come home.”</p>,<p>Shankha remembered that he had given his card to Sunayna. She had got his number from his card.</p>,<p>He was really ecstatic after getting her call. She promised to meet him soon again.</p>,<p>Shankha woke up the next day a bit late, it was Sunday. He woke up around 9 A.M. after he had a late breakfast he called up Sunayna.  He wanted to talk to her again, to see her again. He was anxious. He thought he was falling in love.</p>,<p>He called Sunayna. The phone was ringing, pick up pick up he muttered.  She answered the call. After exchanging pleasantries he asked her “Can I see you somewhere”?</p>,<p>“I am going to Bandstand in the evening. You can meet me today at Bandstand.” She replied.</p>,<p>They were supposed to meet in Bandra bandstand at 5 p.m. Shankha could not  hide his excitement. After all he was going for a date after a long time. After Nisha left he had not gone for dating with anyone. He was staring at the clock, and was thinking why the time is not passing off faster.</p>,<p>Around 4 p.m. Shankha started off for Band stand. He was wearing blue denim jeans and a white full sleeved shirt. He reached Band stand at 4.40. He was standing in the fort in front of the Taj hotel as they had decided. He was waiting eagerly for Sunayna. Suddenly he saw her coming out of an auto. She was wearing a deep blue salwar.  Shankha’s heart was pounding faster.</p>,<p>“She is pretty”, Shankha told himself.  She was tall, slim and fair.</p>,<p>“How long have you been waiting” Sunayna asked.</p>,<p>“A long time, pretty long time actually.” He replied.</p>,<p>They sat by the sea. He told her “We were strangers a day before and within 24 hours we are seeing each other.”</p>,<p>“Its destiny.“ She replied.</p>,<p>One can fall in love anywhere anytime. Shankha thought. He had lost Nisha on 15<sup>th</sup> June 10 years back and he had met Sunayna  on 15<sup>th</sup> June. He looked up at the skies. May be it was Nisha who had send Sunayna to him. They sat by the sea for hours.</p>,<p>Suddenly Shankha took Sunayna’s hands in his hand and whispered “I could feel your breadth, I could see your smile, I knew I loved you before I met you.”</p>,<p>They shared a long passionate kiss.</p>,<p>“You are the most beautiful thing that happened to me.” Sunayna whispered in Shankha’s  ears.</p>,<p>They sat for 3 hours. Time flew like anything. Soon it was 8 o clock. It was time to go.</p>,<p>“I will call you” He said.</p>,<p>“I will wait for your call. I really like you.”  She replied.</p>,<p>“I would like to be with you forever. “  Shankha said as he dropped her in Vashi at her residence. She blushed. He turned his car and sped off towards the highway.</p>,<p>&#8211;END&#8211;</p>,<div class="sharedaddy sd-sharing-enabled"><div class="robots-nocontent sd-block sd-social sd-social-icon-text itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting" itemprop="blogPost"><header class="entry-header"><h1 class="entry-title" itemprop="headline">A numb winter night!</h1> ,<span class="alignleft"><img alt='' src='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/9c55efaa3235647a95ace3643bd2e3be?s=85&#038;d=mm&#038;r=g' srcset='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/9c55efaa3235647a95ace3643bd2e3be?s=170&amp;d=mm&amp;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-85 photo' height='85' width='85' /></span><p class="entry-meta">English Short Story published on <time class="entry-time" itemprop="datePublished" datetime="2017-01-17T14:50:09+00:00">January 17, 2017</time> by <span class="entry-author" itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com/author/edi_nyctophilic/" class="entry-author-link" itemprop="url" rel="author"><span class="entry-author-name" itemprop="name">Edi_nyctophilic</span></a></span> <div class="textwidget"><p><strong>Excerpt: </strong>All the winter nights I survived never felt so cold until this moment, though the jungle melody is playing a soothing base with the hushing trees;  <strong>(Reads: 254)</strong> </p></div><section id="text-before-content-ad" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle"></div><div class="textwidget" style="margin-bottom:10px;"><!--AD START--><div style="text-align: center;">,<!-- YSC_RESP_2 -->,<ins class="adsbygoogle",     style="display:block",     data-ad-client="ca-pub-9888966704027314",     data-ad-slot="2044367786",     data-ad-format="auto"></ins>,<script>,(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});,</script>          ,            </div><!--AD END--></div></div></section><section id="text-before-content" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle">&nbsp;</div><div class="textwidget"></div></div><section></p></header><div class="entry-content" itemprop="text"><p>All the winter nights I survived never felt so cold until this moment, though the jungle melody is playing a soothing base with the hushing trees; dancing leaves supporting the rhythm of the hollow six strings&#8230;</p>,<p>Did I deserve this Loneliness?</p>,<p>&#8220;I whispered to the winds&#8230;</p>,<p>Will I end up sacrificing myself to music?</p>,<p>&#8221; Questioning my troublesome thoughts&#8221;</p>,<p>I remember that serene mesmerizing aura, her walk in the morning, her small dazzling steps as she used to roam while talking. A snowwhite glance that used to reconstruct my world out of nothingness.</p>,<p>I often wonder what is love?</p>,<p>Is it all about acceptance?</p>,<p>Or is it about escape?</p>,<p>I remember her humble words as she detected my lies, her warm hands telling me it&#8217;s alright; you&#8217;ll be alright. As if she created a cosmic circle I used to dissolve myself in, coming out with peace nothing more to adhere.</p>,<p>I often wonder what is love?</p>,<p>Is it all about acceptance?</p>,<p>Or is it about escape?</p>,<p>I remember the first time my eyes caught her sight as if a Goddess I was witnessing with a halo and a whole band of angels to play those love birds nymphamatic rhymes, one moment it was; was everything.</p>,<p>I often wonder what is love?</p>,<p>Is it all about acceptance?</p>,<p>Or is it about escape?</p>,<p>All the winter nights I survived never felt so cold until this moment, though the jungle melody is playing a soothing base with the hushing trees; dancing leaves supporting the rhythm of the hollow six strings&#8230;</p>,<p>Will I reach the shore?</p>,<p>Will she be happy once more?</p>,<p>Will I be able to bring her back?</p>,<p>Will I resolve what all I lack ?</p>,<p>All the winter nights I survived never felt so numb until this moment</p>,<p>A cold numb winter night</p>,<p>&#8211;END&#8211;</p>,<div class="sharedaddy sd-sharing-enabled"><div class="robots-nocontent sd-block sd-social sd-social-icon-text sd-sharing"><h3 class="sd-title">Share this am with you I feel like a someone who really cares about me in this lonely world of mine.... I love you, <strong>(Reads: 404)</strong> </p></div><section id="text-before-content-ad" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle"></div><div class="textwidget" style="margin-bottom:10px;"><!--AD START--><div style="text-align: center;">,<!-- YSC_RESP_2 -->,<ins class="adsbygoogle",     style="display:block",     data-ad-client="ca-pub-9888966704027314",     data-ad-slot="2044367786",     data-ad-format="auto"></ins>,<script>,(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});,</script>          ,            </div><!--AD END--></div></div></section><section id="text-before-content" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle">&nbsp;</div><div class="textwidget"></div></div><section></p></header><div class="entry-content" itemprop="text"><p>I was curious about her . She came daily to church. A cute 19 years old girl . I saw her everyday, I came to church daily for praying to god. I never seen her laughing or talking to many. She had only one friend, she talk to her only.</p>,<p>That day I came early, she walked into the church, and I was at door, I looked into her eyes slowly&#8230; slowly then all at once, and very first time she smiled. I felt some birds were flying inside my heart. Her smile was so innocent , a man would forgot his grief for a while, if he seen her smile !!!. I couldn&#8217;t forgot that day, many days gone we kept looking at each other sharing smiles, sharing eyes looks, and one day I asked her out. She didn&#8217;t replied at first, but next day she did.</p>,<p>She replied to me &#8221; ok I will come with you &#8221;</p>,<p>&#8221; gravity cafe, 223 churchil street at 6 p.m&#8221; I replied at once.</p>,<p>She laughed out loud. I kept looking at her smile. I felt that there is something she hides from this whole world, there is little girl in her heart inside that sad face .</p>,<p>At 5.55 pm I reached at cafe, sat down at one corner on table. She came at 6.10 pm. She was wearing a blue dress, and a little makeup on her face. Ohhh damn!! she was looking so beautiful, I had been waiting for this moment from long time. She sat down infront me, she smiled I also smiled. I ordered coffee and some snacks . We both ate, we were talking , but i felt some awkward there ,so I asked her to took a walk with me outside. She started taking walk with me, I asked her about her family and everything , she was little bit open up now. I was one happy person about her.</p>,<p>But somewhere I felt she was hiding something, she didn&#8217;t wanted to open up about it. Many days passed we now met many times at many places. We both were walking on streets that night, streets were so empty that day, I looked at her she smiled back to me.<br />,&#8221; you know you are so beautiful &#8221; I said.<br />,&#8220;Ohh stop it please, I think I am the most unattractive girl you have ever met in your life.&#8221;she laughed<br />,&#8220;No, dear no just look at you, your are beautiful, yes you are! ! I love your smile and I &#8230;..!! &#8221; he stopped<br />,She broke silence &#8221; ohh thanks..that so sweet of you &#8220;.<br />,&#8220;I think I am in love with you, I think you are the best person i have ever meet in my life&#8230;I &#8230;.I&#8230;&#8221; I was preapring myself infront of mirror. I suddenly stopped for a while and asked myself &#8221; am I really in love with her? &#8221; I looked.at mirror and it gave my answer&#8230;&#8230; I saw her face in that mirror.<br />,We met that day but I couldn&#8217;t told her my feelings. I was unable to express my feeling about her, I knew when I was with her I forgot every grief in my life.I forgot that &#8220;my parents died, I am a lonely child and since I met her I felt she mean to me.&#8221;<br />,We were talking ,sitting at a st.louis garden a place which I loved since my childhood. My dad took me to this garden, my old memories were in that garden. We were talking about her life, my life and I was looking at her, she stopped talking and smiled back to me.<br />,&#8221; What? &#8221; she said.<br />,&#8221; I think I am in love with you Ana ,since I met you I felt something which I never felt after my parents died, you know you are the best thing happen to my life, whenever I am with you I feel like a someone who really cares about me in this lonely world of mine&#8230;. I love you, my love &#8230;I love you, will you marry me? &#8221;</p>,<p>she looked into my eyes, &#8221; see, I love you dear, I mean it, but I think I can&#8217;t marry you, you will find someone better than me dear &#8230;please don&#8217;t ask me why? You are the best thing happen to my life. I love you! &#8221; tears were rolling down from her eyes. I cried a lot that night. I didn&#8217;t seen her for month.</p>,<p>I came to church that day, I prayed. I was leaving the church suddenly she stopped me, a friend of her.<br />,&#8221; She was sad about you, she came to church everyday, and asked me everyday about you &#8221; she said<br />,I was sad too from inside, then I narrated a whole story to her .<br />,&#8220;Ohh, I know why she said no to marry you ,see Ana really loves you, but she don&#8217;t want to hurt you man ..! &#8221; she said.<br />,&#8220;Ohh please she is hurting me ,if she really loves me then what thing is stopping her to marry me &#8221; I said.<br />,&#8220;Well you want to know ?&#8221; she said<br />,&#8221; yes I want to know &#8221; I said<br />,&#8221; she has a cancer Peter !!she has some years left in her hand , I think rest you will understand &#8221; she said</p>,<p>It broke my heart into pieces, why didn&#8217;t she told me, why? . Tears were rolling down from my eyes. I came to my favorite place sat down on a bench where we used to sit. I thought for some minutes, a lot of thoughts comes to my mind. I wipe my tears, its time of her to come to church, I ran for a some minutes I reached at church. She was not there, I looked around, she was sitting on that table.</p>,<p>I walked towards her, she looked at me she came near to me, I took her hand and sat on that bench.we were both looking at reach other.</p>,<p>&#8221; see, Ana I love you, you mean to me, I don&#8217;t believe in soulmates or anything else, but I am going to live with you rest of my life that&#8217;s what I understand!! why you didn&#8217;t told me Ana. Emma told to me today. I know its hardest thing, but Ana if you really don&#8217;t want to hurt me, then marry me! Because my life without you ??that&#8217;s going to hurt me like a hell. please marry me Ana ,I will love you upto last breath of your life &#8221; tears were rolling down from my eyes. She kissed me.</p>,<p>We married in a church, we spend many years happily, she gave a birth to beautiful child. She died after 7 years of our marriage. She was so sick in her last days.She kept looking at me for hours, she barely spoken to anyone in that phase. I cried every night for her. She knew all the things, but that last night she talked to me<br />,&#8221; peter,my love I love you and you are the best thing ever happen to my life, you are my soulmate, you remember, that night peter, you were about to said I love you to me. I was very happy that day peter, and suddenly I remembered about my cancer, and today here I am, giving you the hole in your heart for rest of your life &#8221;</p>,<p>My eyes were filled with tears, I couldn&#8217;t spoke a word. I was crying. I hugged her, kissed her on forehead. &#8220;No my love, you are not giving. a hole in my heart, you gave me best years of my life..and I will love you until last breath of my life,I love you!!! &#8221;</p>,<p>She was smiling, a same smile I saw on her face first time we met &amp; after some minutes she died infront of me in my hand. I cried a lot for many days. But I choosen this choice in my life.</p>,<p>&#8221; Ana, my love today there is our 10 th marriage anniversary and you know you are really a best thing ever happen to my life. I chosen you not because I love you but because you mean to me, you are my soulmate, you deserve me and I deserve you! ! But I really miss you Ana! &amp; see I am not crying, I don&#8217;t get hurt, I am happy about our little infinity you gave it to me. I wish you could able to survived some more days and added some days to this little infinity. But time never stop for anyone , I didn&#8217;t get hurt by you Ana but losing you is hurting me like a hell !! Ana my love, I miss you so much&#8230;!! I will love you until last breath of my life.!! &#8221; some drops of tears were falling down on her photo&#8230;.</p>,<p>&#8211;END&#8211;</p>,<ul>,<li>Nayan Mohitkar</li>,</ul>,<div xmlns:v="http://rdf.data-vocabulary.org/#"><span typeof="v:Breadcrumb"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com" rel="v:url" property="v:title">yourstoryclub</a> &raquo; <span rel="v:child" typeof="v:Breadcrumb"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com/most-popular-short-stories/" rel="v:url" property="v:title">Most Popular Short Stories</a> &raquo; <span rel="v:child" typeof="v:Breadcrumb"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com/story-category/short-stories-love/" rel="v:url" property="v:title">Love Short Stories</a> &raquo; <span class="breadcrumb_last">MY LOVE FOR MOHAN</span></span></span></span></span></div><article class="post-172886 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-short-stories-love tag-college tag-diary tag-dream tag-first-love tag-love entry" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting" itemprop="blogPost"><header class="entry-header"><h1 class="entry-title" itemprop="headline">MY LOVE FOR MOHAN</h1> ,<span class="alignleft"><img alt='' src='http://1.gravatar.com/avatar/d590e4cdbff917e7858b329ee7ff5316?s=85&#038;d=mm&#038;r=g' srcset='http://1.gravatar.com/avatar/d590e4cdbff917e7858b329ee7ff5316?s=170&amp;d=mm&amp;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-85 photo' height='85' width='85' /></span><p class="entry-meta">English Short Story published on <time class="entry-time" itemprop="datePublished" datetime="2017-01-14T14:12:41+00:00">January 14, 2017</time> by <span class="entry-author" itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com/author/sureshmiyer/" class="entry-author-link" itemprop="url" rel="author"><span class="entry-author-name" itemprop="name">sureshmiyer</span></a></span> <div class="textwidget"><p><strong>Excerpt: </strong>Mohan was the most handsome guy in my college. I never knew why I was so awestruck whenever I look at him. I felt scared what if he dislikes me. What can I do to catch his attention ?  <strong>(Reads: 520)</strong> </p></div><section id="text-before-content-ad" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle"></div><div class="textwidget" style="margin-bottom:10px;"><!--AD START--><div style="text-align: center;">,<!-- YSC_RESP_LINK2 -->,<ins class="adsbygoogle",     style="display:block",     data-ad-client="ca-pub-9888966704027314",     data-ad-slot="8260256186",     data-ad-format="link"></ins>,<script>,(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});,</script>          ,            </div><!--AD END--></div></div></section><section id="text-before-content" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle">&nbsp;</div><div class="textwidget"></div></div><section></p></header><div class="entry-content" itemprop="text"><p>I never ever thought of writing my diary.  My pen started scribbling. Obviously, it had to be about Mohan. It&#8217;s been 10 years now and I still could not get over Mohan. Was he my first love?  I could not dare to even think of any other in place of Mohan.</p>,<p>I remember that day very well, because it is the first time I saw him . I could not ever take my eyes off Mohan. Deep within me, I knew that I was being stupid and that he would never think about me. I never understood the mixed emotions that was ringing deep within me. Mohan was the most handsome guy in my college. I never knew why I was so awestruck whenever I look at him. I felt scared what if he dislikes me. What can I do to catch his attention ?</p>,<p>Each time I left the house, I was excited as I could have a glance at him. Evenings back home was boring. I was never treated as a grown up.  My Dad never cared for me but my mom always used to resort to nitpicking right from my things to my studies.  I was pretty decent in studies but my mom compared me with others who she used to think as the best.  I loved affection.  I was usually quite peppy and excitable, but found myself glued to cell phone and avoided meeting friends.</p>,<p>&#8220;Instead of staring at your cellphone, it would be better if you stared at the books.&#8221; she used to quip.</p>,<p>What was happening to me?  Is it wrong to fall in love, and why Mohan!  I did not even had a talk with him. Some may call it infatuation but doesn&#8217;t love start with infatuation.  Shall I take Mohan out for a coffee.  He does not even know me.  I was feeling scared.</p>,<p>&#8220;Hey, Are you in love?&#8221;  Hema used to ask me with mischievous eyes.  Hema was the daughter of my neighbor, who joined my college last year and ever since she was doting on me.  We were always together towards college and back and I felt she was trying to impress me in vain.  She tried to make me laugh when I didn&#8217;t even want to smile.<br />,&#8220;Would you leave? Please?&#8221; I asked her, agitated.</p>,<p>She said she found something amiss with me.  She walked away. I felt guilty.<br />,I apologised to her later in the night. The very next morning she was banging my door, ready to go for college with me.  My Mom was very fond of her and had very good words to say for her.  I wished my Mom said something good about me.<br />,I felt sick.  I was sure, whatever my feelings were, was not going to reach a happy ending.  Shall I just forget everything and move on!<br />,I lay awake a long time that night thinking about Mohan.  Smiling through tears, I slept and dreamt deeply and vividly.  Dreams are elusive.  My childhood dreams were all about cartoons.  I dreamt about becoming a power ranger.  My dreams changed with age and now Mohan was my power ranger.<br />,The next day, I decided to leave before Hema as I wanted to avoid her.  I left early and was walking alone.  To my surprise, Mohan was in his bike passing me.  He quickly glanced at me and stopped.<br />,My heart skipped a beat.  I stood still for a moment.  Everything seemed to stop.  I mean nothing really stopped, but my heart did, for a second.  My eyes were wide open and my mouth the same.<br />,&#8220;Hey, aren&#8217;t you from Model college?&#8221;<br />,I couldn&#8217;t hide my smile as he gestured me to hop on.<br />,&#8220;We never really met though in the same college. Give your mobile no. I will add you in my whatsapp group.&#8221;<br />,I took one deep breath and gave him my number. If only I got a chance to convey Mohan my feelings.<br />,&#8220;Where is Hema?  I often see you with her.&#8221;<br />,I felt irritated.  When I am with him, why ask about Hema?<br />,Soon it started drizzling.<br />,I woke up startled.  It was my Mom who was sprinkling water over me and shouting at me to get up as I was to get ready for the exam in college.<br />,&#8220;Oh No!, it was a dream.<br />,I lazily woke up.  I hated Mom for disrupting my dream. My hearts sank and questions built up in my head.<br />,Few minutes later, the doorbell rang.  I scurried across the corridor to open the door.  It was the same old Hema.<br />,&#8220;Hey, what happened to you? Are you ok!&#8221;  Hema was asking.<br />,I had a sheepish grin<br />,I began stalking Mohan every day, though I found it odd.<br />,Why should I feel guilty?  I used to console myself.<br />,One day, to my dismay, I found Mohan cosying with Sharmila.<br />,Sharmila was one of the pretty girls in my class.  She was rather scantily clad and I did not find appropriate.  I stood transfixed, lost in emotion.  Sharmila found something amiss and seemed to take offense at me.<br />,Mohan was soon red faced and he advanced at me.  I got a thrashing of my life.  I was made to look like a spectacle in the college campus.  I looked around for Hema to console myself but she abruptly left for home ahead of me.<br />,Back home, my dad was, as usual, watching TV unconcerned.  My mom was in deep hysteria at me for falling into bad company and eve teasing at women.<br />,How can I ever tell my Mom that I was not looking at Sharmila but Mohan.  I was in love with him.</p>,<p>&nbsp;</p>,<p>P.S.&#8211; Deepak soon found himself alone.  Even Hema was not around to give him company.  He was not attracted to Hema too.  He was in love with Mohan but knew very well that he can never propose him. Society will call him gay.  Isn&#8217;t gay supposed to be lighthearted and carefree.  Deepak kept down his pen and started reading his own story, a story he would keep reading all his life.</p>,<p>&#8211;END&#8211;</p>,<p>Written by Suresh M Iyer</p>,<div class="sharedaddy sd-sharing-enabled"><div class="robots-nocontent sd-block sd-social sd-social-icon-text sd-sharing"><h3 xmlns:v="http://rdf.data-vocabulary.org/#"><span typeof="v:Breadcrumb"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com" rel="v:url" property="v:title">yourstoryclub</a> &raquo; <span rel="v:child" typeof="v:Breadcrumb"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com/most-popular-short-stories/" rel="v:url" property="v:title">Most Popular Short Stories</a> &raquo; <span rel="v:child" typeof="v:Breadcrumb"><a else matters&#8221;</span></span></span></span></span></div><article class="post-172736 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-short-stories-love tag-facebook tag-love tag-smile entry" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting" itemprop="blogPost"><header class="entry-header"><h1 class="entry-title" itemprop="headline">&#8221;If you&#8217;re in love,nothing else matters&#8221;</h1> ,<span class="alignleft"><img alt='' src='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/c7c9c316095f20ea69eb189f1ddab8ec?s=85&#038;d=mm&#038;r=g' srcset='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/c7c9c316095f20ea69eb189f1ddab8ec?s=170&amp;d=mm&amp;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-85 photo' height='85' width='85' /></span><p class="entry-meta">English Short Story published on <time class="entry-time" itemprop="datePublished" datetime="2017-01-13T22:26:41+00:00">January 13, 2017</time> by <span class="entry-author" itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com/author/linges/" class="entry-author-link" itemprop="url" rel="author"><span class="entry-author-name" itemprop="name">Linges</span></a></span> <div class="textwidget"><p><strong>Excerpt: </strong>My dream guy was standing right beside me and he was also holding my hand. His long fingers comfortably fit in between my small fingers.  <strong>(Reads: 641)</strong> </p></div><section id="text-before-content-ad" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle"></div><div class="textwidget" style="margin-bottom:10px;"><!--AD START--><div style="text-align: center;">,<!-- YSC_RESP_LINK1 -->,<ins class="adsbygoogle",     style="display:block",     data-ad-client="ca-pub-9888966704027314",     data-ad-slot="3830056582",     data-ad-format="link"></ins>,<script>,(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});,</script>          ,            </div><!--AD END--></div></div></section><section id="text-before-content" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle">&nbsp;</div><div class="textwidget"></div></div><section></p></header><div class="entry-content" itemprop="text"><p>LOVE WAS JUST A WORD WITHOUT AN UNKNOWN DEFINITION UNTIL I MET HIM IN MY LIFE</p>,<p>Four years back,<br />,&#8221;Tina,I fall in love with a guy who I met in my tuition class&#8221;<br />,&#8221;Mini,How could you fall in love just like that at this age&#8221;<br />,&#8221;Love does not know anything! I wish I could make myself brave enough to tell him how I feel every time I see him(sighs)&#8221;<br />,&#8221;Whatever!!!Love is just a word with so much of lies in the name of feelings(annoyed)&#8221;<br />,&#8221;You will be in the same situation as me one day very soon and you will understand that if you&#8217;re in love,nothing else matters&#8221;</p>,<p>Four days back,<br />,I fell for this guy who I started chatting with in Facebook. He is just speechless. His friendly words,matured motivations when I&#8217;m down and his caring makes me feel so special and worth to be alive. I get to know that he is Form 5 and he is studying in the same tuition as me. It&#8217;s just that his class is earlier than mine because I&#8217;m Form 4.So, I asked him whether we could meet each other on the next class and Praise God,that he agreed with it.</p>,<p>Today, few hours before, we met each other for the first time. I could not describe that situation in words. I was mesmerized after seeing him. From his head to toe everything was just so perfect. His hair, his long eyelashes, his round brown eyes, his sharp nose, his pinkish-lavender lips and his fair complexion. I was so blurred at that moment that I could just stand still and look at him.</p>,<p>He hit me on my hand,when he realized that my face turned pink. I was just speechless that I could hardly breathe. I could feel the butterflies in my stomach flying around happily. My dream guy was standing right beside me and he was also holding my hand. His long fingers comfortably fit in between my small fingers. He touched my hair and he said he likes it very much and then he let a sweet smile which I feel like I&#8217;m flying in the air. I wish I could just freeze that moment of my life. His smile was so incredibly beautiful and suits perfectly for his handsome face. I realized I fell for him so much at that moment and I want him for the rest of my life that whatever he does was so perfect for me. Now,I knew that If we&#8217;re in love, nothing else matters in this world!</p>,<div class="sharedaddy sd-sharing-enabled"><div class="robots-nocontent sd-block sd-social sd-social-icon-text itemprop="name">gptprnv2289@gmail.com</span></a></span> <div class="textwidget"><p><strong>Excerpt: </strong>Parker opened the door. The first rays of the sun entered the room. The temperature of the room rose drastically. The mirrors and glasses reflected the light on to each other which eventually led to increase the warmth of the room. <strong>(Reads: 302)</strong> </p></div><section id="text-before-content-ad" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle"></div><div class="textwidget" style="margin-bottom:10px;"><!--AD START--><div style="text-align: center;">,<!-- YSC_RESP_LINK1 -->,<ins class="adsbygoogle",     style="display:block",     data-ad-client="ca-pub-9888966704027314",     data-ad-slot="3830056582",     data-ad-format="link"></ins>,<script>,(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});,</script>          ,            </div><!--AD END--></div></div></section><section id="text-before-content" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle">&nbsp;</div><div class="textwidget"></div></div><section></p></header><div class="entry-content" itemprop="text"><p>PART 1 : THE MARRIAGE</p>,<p>Sameera Rathore and Gauri Rathore the two daughters of the Vikram Rathore , the king of Kurdistan. Sameera , the elder daughter of Vikram who had inherited special powers of day where as Gauri, the younger daughter of the king had inherited special powers of the night.</p>,<p>The two daughters had fought each other since childhood and tried to dominate each other powers.As they grew up together they both wanted to get married. But once while playing Sameera threw acid on gauri&#8217;s face.She got sign of burn on her face which could not be removed.Gauri thought that she would not be chosen by any man and will not get married eventually.</p>,<p>Gauri went furious and warned Sameera that she will kill her if she gets married.With age Sameera realized that marriage is necessary and asked Gauri that even she can get married.</p>,<p>&#8220;There are many men.She can choose anyone.After all she is princess born and brought up in a royal family.&#8221; requested Sameera. But Gauri didn&#8217;t listen to it.She went mad and thought negative about herself.</p>,<p>&nbsp;</p>,<p>PART 2 : THE CHANGE OF DECISION.</p>,<p>Parker and Sameera wanted to get married.Everyone agreed.But biggest problem was Gauri.Parker went to Gauri and said,&#8221;Please stay calm princess and everything will become normal with time. There is no need to fight.&#8221;</p>,<p>&#8220;No,Sameera can&#8217;t get married until  I am alive.&#8221; said Gauri to Parker.</p>,<p>Parker became furious but didn&#8217;t lay hand on Gauri. He came back and sat on a seat in a park.He felt horrible and worried that he won&#8217;t be able to get married.</p>,<p>God appeared in complete white clothes and handed over the magical key to him.</p>,<p>&#8220;This key will take you to the door you wish to.You just have to memorize the address of the destination door and put the key in the door&#8221; said God and vanished before parker can ask any more questions.</p>,<p>Parker took the key and went to Gauri&#8217;s palace.He said,&#8221;I want to marry you.But you will have to kill Sameera. &#8221;</p>,<p>Gauri said ,&#8221; Why did you change your decision. &#8221;</p>,<p>&#8220;You are stronger than Sameera that is the reason WHY !!&#8221;,said Parker making his face in an innocent manner.</p>,<p>They loved each other all the night.&#8221;I had fixed my marriage on this Sunday.It is a full moon night.That night your powers will increase and you can easily kill Sameera.&#8221; said Parker</p>,<p>&#8220;Yes,Yeah go on.&#8221; said Gauri.</p>,<p>Parker gifted Gauri a big size mirror which looked amazing and had beautiful embroidery of sea-shells.It reflected Gauri&#8217;s image as she watched herself in bridal clothes.She felt wonderful because finally all the tough days in life were over.She looked very charming and pretty.</p>,<p>Parker put many square-rectangular mirrors on each side of the walls and they made love.He put a glass dome-shaped mirror hanging from the roof top.He made sure that the images looked clean and room becomes warmer.</p>,<p>&nbsp;</p>,<p>PART 3 : THE WEDDING DAY</p>,<p>Parker decided to host his wedding at a hill .He told Sameera that she must get ready as the marriage arrangements have been done.Sameera feared that something horrible might not happen. She looked worried that Gauri might take any action.She felt nervous that her powers will diminish after she get married.</p>,<p>&#8220;She might hurt you.I am afraid for you.&#8221;,said Sameera to Parker.</p>,<p>&#8220;Don&#8217;t worry for me.Nothing will happen&#8221;said Parker as he hugged and kissed her shoulder.</p>,<p>Finally the day had arrived and all the arrangements were over.Everyone waited for the glimpse of the royal wedding.Parker also built a small room which was same as that of the Gauri&#8217;s palace room.It had the same bed,same curtains and same mirrors on the wall.Everything was same.It was beautifully decorated. No one outside could recognize that why that room was built.</p>,<p>The marriage in full moon night began.It was a lavish and extravagant wedding.People wore flamboyant and extravagant dresses.It was looking wonderful.Everybody gathered.Parker didn&#8217;t come on time.Then he went to Gauri&#8217;s palace and said,&#8221;Finally the time has come and the day has arrived.You must kill Sameera.&#8221;</p>,<p>Gauri dressed up and was ready.Parker went towards her and kissed her.He carried her on his arms walked to the door taking the magical key in hand.He took Gauri to room above the mountain in front of marriage celebration place.Gauri couldn&#8217;t even realize anything that the location was changed but the room was exactly the same.He put Gauri back on the bed again and said ,&#8221;We will live happily for ever.&#8221;</p>,<p>In bridegroom&#8217;s dress Parker walked out saying that he would be back in a moment.Gauri waited.</p>,<p>Parker walked to the place where Sameera was waiting as a bride.She looked stunning. The marriage ceremony was completed and both of them were happy.</p>,<p>It was morning time and full moon night was over.The sun rays were on the mountain.</p>,<p>Parker said to Sameera,&#8221;We are going to spend our first night in that room.&#8221;</p>,<p>Sameera said ,&#8221;You built that room for me.Thank you for all the memories and what all you have done.&#8221;</p>,<p>Parker opened the door. The first rays of the sun entered the room. The temperature of the room rose drastically. The mirrors and glasses reflected the light on to each other which eventually led to increase the warmth of the room.</p>,<p>Gauri felt uncomfortable and shouted ,&#8221; How could sun rays enter inside the room.Help! Help! &#8220;.She realized that her powers are decreasing in the hot room.She watched Sameera and Parker inside the room.Gauri cried out,&#8221; Parker help.&#8221;</p>,<p>Parker pointing his hand towards Gauri said to Sameera, &#8220;Your powers are increasing.Kill her.This is our best chance.We will live happily after Gauri&#8217;s death.&#8221;</p>,<p>Gauri cried out,&#8221;You cheated me Parker.You made this plan.Stop this.I love you and have broken my trust.&#8221;</p>,<p>Parker replied ,&#8221; Don&#8217;t blame me for what I have done.You did this to yourself.You tried to kill Sameera and break my marriage. &#8221;</p>,<p>Sameera softly said,&#8221;Let us give her one more chance.After all she is my sister.How did you get her inside this room.&#8221;</p>,<p>Gauri answered, &#8220;Thank you for your politeness.I will never come closer to both of you.&#8221;</p>,<p>But Sam grew frustrated and said,&#8221;What ? She will change from her word.Do as I say.Don&#8217;t think too much.She will not spare us afterwards and I have done all this work for you and you only.&#8221;</p>,<p>Sam angrily shouted,&#8221;Do as I say.Just finish it&#8221;.</p>,<p>Sameera jumped towards her sister .Sameera changed herself to a white angel.Gauri changed to a black witch.They both grabbed each others neck.Finally Sameera won and the body of Gauri turned into ashes.</p>,<p>Sameera and Parker hugged and cried for each other.They both came out to the public.Sameera always remembered what he did for her.</p>,<p>The crowd waved their hands.Drums started to beat,piano started to pick the music,singers started to sing and cheer leader started to cheer up.</p>,<p>Sameera and Parker met everyone who blessed them.They both lived happily ever after.</p>,<p>&#8211;END&#8211;</p>,<div class="sharedaddy sd-sharing-enabled"><div class="robots-nocontent sd-block sd-social sd-social-icon-text sd-sharing"><h3 Awesomeness</span></span></span></span></span></div><article class="post-172696 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-short-stories-love tag-best-friends tag-donation tag-heart tag-life tag-love tag-teenager entry" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting" itemprop="blogPost"><header class="entry-header"><h1 class="entry-title" itemprop="headline">Heart&#8217;s Awesomeness</h1> ,<span class="alignleft"><img alt='' src='http://1.gravatar.com/avatar/75a0ad1e3c1a7f07a5dd5212928968df?s=85&#038;d=mm&#038;r=g' srcset='http://1.gravatar.com/avatar/75a0ad1e3c1a7f07a5dd5212928968df?s=170&amp;d=mm&amp;r=g 2x' class='avatar avatar-85 photo' height='85' width='85' /></span><p class="entry-meta">English Short Story published on <time class="entry-time" itemprop="datePublished" datetime="2017-01-13T14:14:22+00:00">January 13, 2017</time> by <span class="entry-author" itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com/author/meghana-raju/" class="entry-author-link" itemprop="url" rel="author"><span class="entry-author-name" itemprop="name">meghana raju</span></a></span> <div class="textwidget"><p><strong>Excerpt: </strong>I could be myself with Shaun. Laugh like I want to, talk what I want to, be the way I want to be with him. I was every bit in love with him. I was a normal girl with a normal life and extraordinarily special person ‘Shaun’ in my life. <strong>(Reads: 481)</strong> </p></div><section id="text-before-content-ad" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle"></div><div class="textwidget" style="margin-bottom:10px;"><!--AD START--><div style="text-align: center;">,<!-- YSC_RESP_1 -->,<ins class="adsbygoogle",     style="display:block",     data-ad-client="ca-pub-9888966704027314",     data-ad-slot="4736285789",     data-ad-format="auto"></ins>,<script>,(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});,</script>          ,            </div><!--AD END--></div></div></section><section id="text-before-content" class="widget widget_text"><div class="widget-wrap"><div class="widget-title widgettitle">&nbsp;</div><div class="textwidget"></div></div><section></p></header><div class="entry-content" itemprop="text"><div id="attachment_8828" style="width: 460px" class="wp-caption aligncenter"><a href="http://i1.wp.com/yourstoryclub.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/05/divine-immortal-love-heart.jpg"><img class="size-full wp-image-8828" src="http://i1.wp.com/yourstoryclub.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/05/divine-immortal-love-heart.jpg?w=450" alt="divine-immortal-love-heart" srcset="http://i1.wp.com/yourstoryclub.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/05/divine-immortal-love-heart.jpg?w=620 620w, http://i1.wp.com/yourstoryclub.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/05/divine-immortal-love-heart.jpg?resize=300%2C200 300w" sizes="(max-width: 620px) 100vw, 620px" data-recalc-dims="1" /></a><p class="wp-caption-text">Love Short Story &#8211; Heart&#8217;s Awesomeness<br />Photo credit: <a href="http://www.morguefile.com/creative/imelenchon" rel="nofollow external">imelenchon</a> from <a href="http://www.morguefile.com/" rel="nofollow external">morguefile.com</a></p></div>,<p>Hi I am Rhea. A 16 year old, normal girl who loved to do all normal things pretty much like all the other girls in town. I was the apple of my parent’s eye and was their darling princess. Everything was normal in my life except that everything was not normal. My life was going at the rate double of any other individual. It’s always on fast forward mode.  Now, don’t think a lot. It isn’t any acquired talent that am supersonic. I am purely gifted!! Yes I am gifted with two hearts, two fully functional blood pumping machines!!</p>,<p>Some people called me abnormal, some people called me special and for some I didn’t even exist. I never bothered about such names. For me, I was awesome and my condition was Rhea’s Heart Awesomeness.</p>,<p>There were a set of people who assumed that I was extremely affluent in terms of my organs and demanded that that I donate my ‘EXTRA’ heart. Really?? It’s like asking someone to donate all his money to charity just because he has ‘EXTRA’ money!! My response was a flat NO!! Forget about other people, my own mother also wanted me to donate something which made me feel special!!</p>,<p>&#8216;Are you sure, Rhea?&#8217; asks my mother.</p>,<p>&#8216;Of course I&#8217;m. Survival of the fittest, mother. I&#8217;m not going against Darwin. Also I don&#8217;t want unnecessary scars on my body.&#8217;</p>,<p>It&#8217;s a known fact that we are all born to die. And frankly, I don&#8217;t understand why it has to be made into such a big deal. If it were not for my mother I would have said that to the bunch of people outside my house, some of them with young kids, shouting slogans, waving placards, literally wanting me to cut one of my beating hearts out. &#8220;Save A Life. Donate!&#8221; they shout.</p>,<p>For someone who is one in billions, 7.125 billion to be exact, I expect to be treated better. Scientists are still befuddled regarding my condition that gave me two hearts in my mother&#8217;s womb. But years of research and sticking needles into me have led them nowhere, and they have labelled me as a freak mutation. It&#8217;s so rare &#8211; literally one in all humankind &#8211; that they didn&#8217;t even name the anomaly (as they call it, I will call it awesomeness). I wanted to name the condition myself, something on the lines of Rhea&#8217;s Heartsawesome but the doctors aren&#8217;t thrilled with the suggestion. Instead they want to cut one of them out and save a life. Huh?</p>,<p>An IQ of 180, increased concentration, exceptional athleticism and a phenomenal metabolism rate &#8211; are just the few boring benefits of an increased blood circulation. Why would I ever give that up?</p>,<p>The debates and the protests continued and I went on to lead my awesome life.</p>,<p>A fine sunny Monday morning, as I stepped out of my house, I saw a tall lean boy of about the same age with bright blue eyes and a tousle of brown hair speaking to someone. As I came out I noticed that he glanced a furtive look at me. Being a snob that I was, I ignored him and walked to my school. I saw him on the second day too, standing at the same place but this time he was alone. This went on for about 2 weeks after which I decided to confront him. He was Shaun, a boy from my neighborhood who knew me thanks to my ‘Awesomeness’ and wanted to meet me in person. I was a little apprehensive in the beginning but being a celebrity, I thought I need to treat my fans rather well and gave him a chance. I met him almost every day and as days passed by, we started getting closer. From having a cup of coffee together, we started going out for dinner. Sometimes we would just sit and read aloud our favorite books to each other. We were similar yet different. We complimented each other. I grew quite comfortable sharing my deep thoughts to him.  It was not long before I realized that I was head over heels in love with him.</p>,<p>I continued living my fairy tale when one day Shaun introduced me to his best friend Kabir. Kabir was a well-built, tall guy with thick black hair and deep set jaws which gave his face a chiseled look. We three, Kabir, Shaun and I hung out a lot. We discussed a lot of stuff together ranging from cricket to football to girls and guys and what not. I loved spending time with Shaun, with or without Kabir. My love for Shaun grew exponentially. I could do anything for him. There was not a single moment in a day which was not spent with him or was spent without me thinking about him.</p>,<p>Life was beautiful or at least I thought so. It was Shaun’s birthday on February the 14<sup>th</sup>. I wanted to surprise him and be with him when the clock strikes 12. I selected a red dress for myself, the prettiest one I had, left my hair loose and set out in my car at 11:30PM. I reached his place, got out of my car and gave myself a tight hug. I was thrilled at the prospect of surprising him. I knocked softly on the door and waited for him nervously. I knew Shaun stays alone at his home while his parents visit him once in a while. There was no response and I knocked again. I tried calling and he wasn’t reachable. This was weird!! Shaun never keeps his cell switched off and it was his birthday!! Definitely not today!!</p>,<p>I decided to go back home and meet him the next day. I was about to leave when I thought I heard muffled noise coming from within the house. Before I could dismiss the thought as my imagination, I heard it again. This time I could make out the distinguished voices of two people talking to each other. I went over to the backyard. I looked for some way in and found a window open. I hauled myself into the passageway through the window. I entered the hall and saw no one. I could still hear the voices and it appeared to come in from the room upstairs. I slowly made my way up the stairs and came up to a room with its lights on and door open wide. I could see Shaun sitting on the edge of the bed with his back turned to me. I couldn’t think of a reason Shaun would do this and peered into the room to get a better view. I was shell-shocked to see whom Shaun was speaking to. It was Kabir!!</p>,<p>I couldn’t understand what was happening. Kabir was crying out loud and Shaun was consoling him. I could make out heart, death, separation, love, no more, the end and few other such words. I was still trying to understand the situation when something happened and I felt the floor beneath me give away. Kabir was in Shaun’s arms still sobbing, Shaun took his face in his hands and planted a light kiss on his forehead. He then slowly moved his lips down until their lips met and they kissed each other passionately. I kept looking at them aghast. I was blank. Every inch of my body screamed with pain, with disappointment, with agony. I wanted to pull Shaun by his collar and demand an explanation for his acts but I couldn’t move. Everything came to a standstill.</p>,<p>I kept staring at the person I loved the most being so intimate with another. Slowly, after a while, I gathered myself, retraced my steps to my car and drove back home. I was hurt, I was cheated from no one but the man I loved the most. I couldn’t sleep. I couldn’t understand why Shaun came into my life when he loved someone else. I tried to remember the conversation that happened between Kabir and Shaun in his room. Nothing made sense. I pondered over it again and again. I tried to remember every conversation that Kabir, Shaun and I had had. And slowly, piece by piece, everything started to fit in like a jigsaw puzzle.</p>,<p>Shaun had once told me that Kabir came into the city looking for a heart specialist. Though Shaun never told me the exact problem Kabir faced, I knew that Kabir had a major problem in his heart and if not treated immediately, his condition could get worsened. I had also seen many documents in Shaun’s laptop regarding heart transplantation. Shaun loved me for a reason; Shaun loved me because he wanted something from me; Shaun loved me because he wanted my heart!!</p>,<p>I had to make a decision and by the time the sun rose; I had made.</p>,<p>Next day, Shaun picked me up from my home and we both went out for lunch. He seemed unusually happy. Even before I could ask him where he was the previous night, he told me that he had slept and hence couldn’t talk to me. There was not a single trace of emotion on my face. I just smiled throughout and he kept on talking. We had an otherwise romantic lunch date and we strolled across the riverside with him holding my hands. To an outsider, everything looked just perfect and sweet but to me there was nothing else other than pain and agony.</p>,<p>Later in the evening, Kabir joined us. Just like Shaun, Kabir was ecstatic. Shaun and Kabir greeted each other like long lost friends. Kabir informed me that his doctor had told him that his heart problem would be cured and he would be alright very soon. I congratulated him and gave him a warm smile. I had never seen Shaun so happy. I told Shaun that I needed to go home and left them. I silently walked back and left them to bask in their happiness.</p>,<p>I never met Shaun after that day. Shaun tried to contact me a lot of times but I never got back to him. I loved Shaun and I could do anything for him. I couldn’t be with Shaun but my heart could. I still loved him but I loved him through Kabir. I became the soul of their relationship.</p>,<p>I was no more awesome; I was normal Rhea with a normal life.</p>,<p>Hi I am Rhea. A 16 year old very normal girl who loved to do all normal things pretty much like the girls in town. I was the apple of my parent’s eye and was their darling princess. Everything was normal in my life……………….And everything will be normal!!</p>,<p>&#8211;END&#8211;</p>,<div class="sharedaddy sd-sharing-enabled"><div class="robots-nocontent sd-block sd-social xmlns:v="http://rdf.data-vocabulary.org/#"><span typeof="v:Breadcrumb"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com" rel="v:url" property="v:title">yourstoryclub</a> &raquo; <span rel="v:child" typeof="v:Breadcrumb"><a href="http://yourstoryclub.com/most-popular-short-stories/" rel="v:url" property="v:title">Most Popular Short Stories</a> &raquo; <span rel="v:child" typeof="v:Breadcrumb"><a
